Effect / Reminder Text: This Mecha's power is equal to the number of Mechas you control.
Flight (This unit can't be attacked except by units with Flight or Reach). The cost of adjacent Mechas is decreased by 1 (a bandwidth cost can't be less than 0).

Armour 1 (This unit enters the battlefield with one Armour counter. If it would take damage while it has any Armour counters, prevent that damage and remove an Armour counter). Range 3 (This unit may attack any target within three spaces). This Mecha may not attack and move in the same turn.
Search you deck for a card with the word "Cat" in it's name. Then, search your deck for a card with the word "Dog" in it's name. Put those cards into your hand, then shuffle your deck.
Search your deck for two cards with the word "Bull" in their names. Put those cards into your hand, then shuffle your deck.
Other Mechas with the word "Eel" in their names that you control have +1 power.
When this Mecha enters the battlefield, other Mechas with the word "Eel" in their names that you control gain +1 durability.
